CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 1 reads: "The Courier's second annual Home Service Fair opened Tuesday to a packed house...Held at Ammon Recreation Center..."
TitMainTitle: A & P Food Stores, Best Foods, Inc., Shinola Shoe Polish, and Pet Milk Co. booths in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
